reviews.review_text: We have worked with The Great Canadian Landscaping Company on a few projects through out the years. Recently they took on the Landscaping portion of a Coach House project in North Vancouver for us. The team did an amazing job from design, site prep, concrete work, fence installation, paving, planting, lighting, irrigation and more. We worked with Chris and Peter on the project and would not hesitate to hire them again. Thanks!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Karim and Kaveh. We love working with Goldcon and your clients. As always, cannot wait for the next project to partner with you both on. Chris

reviews.review_text: Just had a few fence panels replaced.  The gents that did the work were courteous, efficient and diligent.  On time and they nicely cleaned up after themselves.Very happy with the job done.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Al, Thank you for the kind words for out crew! We appreciate it a lot! Chris

reviews.review_text: I would very much like to thank everyone at The Great Canadian Landscaping Company who made the effort to reduce the noise of the equipment used to do the landscaping this summer at my building on West 7th Avenue in Vancouver.  I very much appreciate your sensitivity to this issue.  Yours truly, R. Massey
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Robin, Thank you for your kind message and review! It is much appreciated! We will let the team know! Chris

reviews.review_text: The best landscaping company on the North Shore! With many experienced people working within the team they will not disappoint. From regular maintenance to keeping your gardens looking good all year round, to big garden clean ups & installations they re the best for all your landscaping needs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Lindsay! Appreciate the kind comments! Its all about the people that work here and they are what make our company so amazing!

reviews.review_text: Its currently snowing outside, and coming down like crazy. But thanks to Great Canadian Landscaping, our sidewalks are clean and free of any ice. I was impressed with their friendliness, and how thorough they are, theyve done a great job. A few days ago, I went out first thing in the morning, and, despite the overnight snow, sidewalks had been already cleaned.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Carmen, Thank you so much for the comment and positive feedback! It s The Great Canadian Way! S(no)w worries now for you and your fellow residents! Happy Holidays! Chris

reviews.review_text: The Great Canadian Landscaping company did a moderate-sized backyard reno and design for us in October and November. They did a fantastic job and showed up every day until the job was completed, on time and on budget. Stephane and the rest of the crew were a pleasure to work with, and were very meticulous about all details, and had some great suggestions. The backyard looks amazing, and they left the worksite spotless. Cant wait for summer to enjoy it! We highly recommend this company and will definitely use them again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rob, Thanks very much for your review and kind words. We are glad you are happy with the work and look forward to helping you again if the need comes up. Chris

reviews.review_text: Great Canadian is very good. They design, install and maintain your yard perfectly . A one stop amazing experience . Locally owned and operated and always give me great service and great advice .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Grant, Thank you for your review. It means a lot to our team to hear how much you appreciate our services and the experience you have received. We look forward to continuing to service your property for years to come. Chris & Team GR8CDN

reviews.review_text: Chris and team took over the site from an early botched attempt at a landscape installation on my 15,000 sqft property -- new construction and they were late in the game towards competition, we had to GO. It was still ground zero landscape wise, but even the landscape architecture was flawed and not what I wanted to achieve. We had to start over. While I had the tone, feeling, vibe and texture I wanted, the details were outside my scope, I had no idea how to get this done. Chris leaned in, created ideas and concepts from the words I had to share, partnered with a designer for even more input and we executed -- GCLC executed. They crushed the installation. Heavy equipment everywhere, dirt flying, landscape going down and yet, every single day they left the site, immaculate. Contractors dont work this way, ever. GCLC does. There is pride in every job that you rarely see, in each day, in how they show up, how they leave and if issues arise, pride in how they work to solve those issues. It was beautiful. It is beautiful. Since then, GCLC has continued on with me for 4 years -- weekly maintenance, snow removal in the winter (and they literally sing together, while moving snow in the cold! ...when the people are happy, the work done is always better, huge cheers to the culture this company has been able to create, its impressive). Each spring, we always find the next project to build on the overall theme. The maintenance team cares, as if its their house... and weve found, dare I say friendship! Its great to see them each week, always hustling, grabbing my input as they go. New tree, new garden bed? New drainage problem that came out of nowhere from an ever changing landscape? Lets never stop building GCLC -- you will always be my landscape team.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tim, Thank you so much for your amazing review. It has been a pleasure to work with you and continue improving your home year after year. We love working clients like you and look forward to many years to come. Chris

reviews.review_text: I hired GCLC last spring to look after 3 buildings and added a 4th one in the summer.  I found them to be well organized and very professional.  From the time I signed the contract, I was introduce to the team leader who was going to perform the work on site and given their contact information.  From their first visit we could see a difference and tenants commented about the improvement.  Whenever I had a concern, it was addressed timely and professionally.  They have gone beyond and I am very impressed with their services.  I would not hesitate to recommend them and they certainly have my business for any future buildings the company acquires.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your positive comment. We appreciate it very much. We appreciate the opportunity to work for you and the properties you manage.

reviews.review_text: Our experience with GCL started off differently than most. An employee, Luke, accidentally backed in to my vehicle in a parking lot. Instead of driving away he went looking for the owner of the vehicle to take responsibility. The owner of GCL made it so easy for us to have it fixed. After having a bad experience with another company, we thought we would give GCL a chance. If you have employees that are responsible for their actions like Luke, you must be a great company to hire! We were right, these guys did a great job. They weren t cheap, but you can t buy a Ferrari for the price of a Honda. Two guys came and worked hard all day and got our job done (garden and our lawn). They were worth every penny. We will recommend them to anyone that asks, and we will be using them every year! Thank you GCL, you guys are awesome!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Cory! Not the way we like to meet clients the first time but in the end it was not such a bad way to meet!

reviews.review_text: We are very pleased with the landscaping, natural stone retaining wall, front patio and driveway installed on our home by GCLC.   Jeremy, Peter, Catharine, Steve and the whole team were all extremely knowledgeable, professional, reliable and provided excellent suggestions on our project.  It was a big project for us and the results certainly exceeded our expectations.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Margo, Thank you for taking the time to let our team know about your experience with our company and the team that completed your project. It means a lot.  Cant wait  to help you again in the future. Chris

reviews.review_text: The Great Canadian Landscaping Company Ltd. performs landscape maintenance at two properties in Vancouver that I manage.  Both properties always look great and this really increases the curb appeal of the buildings I manage.  They are really on top of the properties landscape maintenance.  They always show up when scheduled and do a top rate job!  The crews very professional.  I find the Maintenance Manager, Derek, always responsive whenever I have a question.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the positive comments. We really appreciate the feedback. We love taking care of your properties as well! Chris

reviews.review_text: Chris and his team are fabulous.  They completely transformed our backyard!  There were many different layers to the project but everything was completed on time and we couldnt be more happy with the end result.  Every trade was punctual, attentive to detail and a pleasure to work with.  Chris and Gord were patient with our design ideas and always conscious of our budget.  We could not recommend them more highly.  Thanks guys!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tracy! We truly appreciate your review and the opportunity to build your dream landscape!

reviews.review_text: Had an issue with a Gift Certificate for this Company.  They took care of it immediately.  I was happy with the way handled everything.  Very professional.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ron. Sorry we couldnt have been of service to you! Glad it all worked out.

reviews.review_text: We have used Great Canadian for over two years now and their staff are always extremely professional and prompt. They keep our yard trimmed year around and never leave any mess. Weve very happy with them and recommend them to our friends as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Louis, Thank you for your positive comments! We appreciate the opportunity to work for you and your family. Sincerely, Chris ODonohue President / Founder

reviews.review_text: Last summer we realised a dream! For years we fantasized about transforming our back yard from moss/ant infested concrete pavers with an uninspiring rock garden perimeter to an inspired eating and living space complete with cosy fireplace and easy to maintain yet beautiful landscaping. Choosing companies is mostly a random exercise so from the moment we initially met to discuss the plans, until the project was complete, it was nothing short of spectacular. Of importance, is that everyone who worked on the project offered many suggestions and solutions that ultimately added value to the final outcome. Plus the project was completed on time and on budget and everyone was professional, friendly and went beyond what was expected. Save yourself the agonizing search for a company that will meet all your expectations and choose Great Canadian Landscaping. Sandi Yang
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sandy, Thank you for trusting our team to make your dreams a reality! It was our pleasure to work with you on this transformation. Chris and Team GR8CDN

reviews.review_text: Wonderful experience getting artificial turf installed by Braden, Tony and their team! Would highly recommend them if you re looking for a hard working professional crew to do an excellent job!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nathan, Thank you for the opportunity to transform your backyard! Chris and team!

reviews.review_text: Friendly guys to deal with and the pricing is bang on for my needs. I have used them for both my commercial snow removal needs and for my home, as I live and work in North Vancouver. Highly recommend them to anyone on the North Shore looking for hard working guys that know what theyre doing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Scott! Appreciate the review!

reviews.review_text: Love these guys, my yard has never looked this good! Lots of detail looked after, good advice and whatever they treated my lawn with in the spring is magic. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jane, Thanks for the comments on our team and the work we did for you! Appreciate the feedback! Chris

reviews.review_text: After following Great Canadian Lawns on facebook, Ive seen some amazing results from their work - It makes me excited to think about the potential of my own little yard and what I could try doing with their help!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Natalie!

reviews.review_text: Great people , great results. Highly reccomend using them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Eric and Kayzia, Thank you for the 5 star review. We truly enjoyed getting your landscape completed for your new home. Hope you enjoy many summers in your new piece of paridise! Chris and Team GR8CDN

reviews.review_text: Really great company! I love that they take care of their employees so well :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hailey,  Thank you so much for your review. We greatly appreciate comments like this!   Chris

reviews.review_text: They did snow removal, good job. chris is the guy to get things done.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for for the positive comments. Its what we strive for everyday!

reviews.review_text: Great Canadian and the team are amazing.  Would recommend them highly
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your positive comments on our team! We appreciate it. Chris ODonohue President / Founder

reviews.review_text: I think this company is , one of the best landscaping company  in canada .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Majid, Thank you for your compliment! It is truly appreciated. Chris ODonohue President / Founder

reviews.review_text: Great for all your landscaping needs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nicole, Thank you for your positive comments! Chris President
Alireza, Thanks for the positive review! It means the world to our team! Chris
Thanks for the 5 stars!
Cris, Thanks for the 5 star review! We appreciate you for taking the time to provide a review! Chris and Team
Thanks for the 5 stars! Appreciate the review!
Hi Aidan, Thanks for the review! We appreciate it a lot! Chris
Thanks Malcolm for the the 5 Stars! It means a lot.
Thanks Cameron, we appreciate your review of our work!
Thanks for the review!
Sean, Thanks for your 5 star review. We love working with you and your team at Crystalview Pool and Spa. Chris and Team GR8CDN

reviews.review_text: We have been using GCLC (Great Canadian Landscaping) for a year for our Stratas landscaping and we started using them for Snow removal this year (2019-2020). Our previous company over salted and killed a number of our garden plants as well as an expensive hedge. As well their attention to snow clearing was lacking at best. I was constantly out clearing our walkways and the city sidewalks that where our legal responsibility. GCLC uses IceMelt, a pet safe product, and a much more careful and thoughtful application that seems to not affect our plants as much, AND the gold star, the snow clearing is down to the concrete. Our sidewalks are clearer than our neighbours! The areas around entrances, recycling and garbage areas are thoroughly cleared making me worry less for my older neighbours whom the slippery conditions are a hazard. Thank you GCLC! Wendral Court Strata North Vancouver
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mark for your glowing review! We appreciate comments like this and look forward to continue servicing your Strata property for years to come.

reviews.review_text: I called three times trying to get a quote for some work at my home. I was told each time that Chris would be getting back to me to set up a time to meet at the property. Never received a call back and ended up using a different company. I can appreciate that you may be too busy but at least let people inquiring for an estimate know. Other companies that were overbooked were courteous enough to inform me and recommend another landscaping company
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mehr, I am sorry that things didnt get sorted as you had wished. If I can be of service still please call the office 604-924-5296. It was never my intention to not reply but for some reason or another the mistake was made. Sincerely, Chris ODonohue President

reviews.review_text: They were promt in the beginning, showing up at site meeting. But after that they ignored emails, messages, calls It would save much more time and more professional if they can just be straightforward and say  no, we don t have time for you
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Yasmin, I very sorry to hear about your experience. I would love to discuss it in more detail to make sure this type of experience doesnt happen in the future. We try our best to make sure all clients or potential clients are well looked after. I can be reached a the office 604-924-5296. Chris (Owner)

reviews.review_text: Pretty sad that  your employee was in such a hurry to park the company vehicle, he has put others in danger by blocking the stop sign. Unacceptable!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Heidi, I replied to you first on Facebook upon discovering the situation at hand. I realize that I missed replying to you hear and I hope you got my Facebook reply as I have not heard anything since. I did come down and move the vehicle right away after getting your message. What happened with our vehicle is unfortunate and the new employee has been trained on where to park the company vehicles moving forward. We also discuss this regularly at our team meetings which happen once a month. Unfortunately, he misunderstood and didnt follow the parking regulations that day. He was disciplined for his actions and I am sorry he put the public at risk with his actions. Sincerely, Chris ODonohue President / Founder
